data.lyric:
[ti:private island (Explicit)]
[ar:Gunna]
[al:DS4EVER (Explicit)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]private island (Explicit) - Gunna
[00:00.12]Lyrics by：Rex Masamune Kudo/Sergio Kitchens/Wesley Glass
[00:00.40]Wheezy outta here
[00:00.75]
[00:12.85]I'm just kickin' it with a baddie smokin' on exotic
[00:15.13]Yes
[00:15.69]Ain't it ironic look at me now I used to sell narcotics
[00:18.11]Yes
[00:18.35]Couldn't sell it whole had to break it down but now it's all profit
[00:20.80]All profit
[00:21.34]They don't like advice but I know this life just ain't for everybody
[00:24.19]I done heard too many times you can't get rich with no knowledge
[00:26.97]No knowledge
[00:27.51]Told the shawty if she mine then promise me you keep it solid
[00:29.91]Keep it solid
[00:30.43]You know b***hes talk but you with a boss so we keep our business private
[00:33.03]Business private
[00:33.46]He ain't never f**ked you on a privatе island
[00:35.64]I fly G5 I don't know the sky mileage
[00:37.51]Sky mileage
[00:37.82]I got some slimes out a beehive I know they dying 'bout it
[00:39.91]Dying 'bout it
[00:40.83]CIP Troup I'm holding it down
[00:42.50]You on my mind Charlie
[00:43.53]On my mind Charlie
[00:44.14]I got on all white Chanel I feel godly
[00:45.76]Feel godly
[00:46.19]Every one of my cribs spotless
[00:47.32]Cribs spotless
[00:48.04]Oh we made a way oh made a way
[00:51.14]
[00:52.84]I knew we would see better days
[00:53.94]
[00:55.76]I knew we would see better days
[00:57.04]
[00:58.71]Oh made a way
[00:59.29]
[01:00.30]Why they facial expression givin' hate
[01:01.40]
[01:02.49]Why they act like I ain't helping 'em out 'cause they energy fake
[01:05.08]
[01:05.98]Must've think I didn't have nothing to say
[01:07.30]
[01:08.47]My first deal was 1.5 it wasn't nothing left to say
[01:10.42]
[01:11.23]The thanks I get feel like high-five I know I changed the wave
[01:13.51]
[01:14.02]When I'm outside the sun gon' shine ain't no more rainy days
[01:16.37]
[01:16.92]She love my vibe I love her vibe I mean what can I say
[01:19.84]Count it when you pray
[01:21.53]Thank god for these better days
[01:22.58]
[01:24.19]Oh we made a way oh made a way
[01:27.20]
[01:28.80]I knew we would see better days
[01:29.85]
[01:31.78]I knew we would see better days
[01:32.99]
[01:34.71]Oh made a way
[01:35.33]
[01:36.81]I'm just kickin' it with a baddie smokin' on exotic
[01:38.97]Yes
[01:39.51]Ain't it ironic look at me now I used to sell narcotics
[01:41.96]Yes
[01:42.42]Couldn't sell it whole had to break it down but now it's all profit
[01:44.87]All profit
[01:45.37]They don't like advice but I know this life just ain't for everybody
[01:48.23]I done heard too many times you can't get rich with no knowledge
[01:50.83]No knowledge
[01:51.35]Told the shawty if she mine then promise me you keep it solid
[01:53.87]Keep it solid
[01:54.23]You know b***hes talk but you with a boss so we keep our business private
[01:57.01]Business private
[01:57.53]He ain't never f**ked you on a private island
data.trans:
[ti:private island (Explicit)]
[ar:Gunna]
[al:DS4EVER (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.12]//
[00:00.40]Wheezy制作
[00:00.75]
[00:12.85]我只是找了个妞想放松放松 吞云吐雾 感受一下异国风情
[00:15.13]是的
[00:15.69]这是不是很讽刺 看看现在的我 曾经我还要靠做地下买卖谋生
[00:18.11]是的
[00:18.35]不能把拿到的货整个卖掉 必须要拆开 但现在都给我带来了利润
[00:20.80]利润
[00:21.34]他们不喜欢听取建议 但我知道这样的生活不适合每一个人
[00:24.19]我听过太多次这样的话 肚子里没点墨水你是不可能富起来的
[00:26.97]肚子里没点墨水
[00:27.51]告诉那女人 她如果是我的 那就答应我会对我坚定不移
[00:29.91]对我坚定不移
[00:30.43]你知道妇人总是说三道四 但你身边是个大人物 所以我们的事情需要保密
[00:33.03]保密
[00:33.46]他从没在私人小岛上与你谈情说爱
[00:35.64]我坐着私人飞机 不了解飞行里程这种东西
[00:37.51]飞行里程
[00:37.82]我带上了一些兄弟 我知道他们能为我赌上性命
[00:39.91]赌上性命
[00:40.83]安息吧 Keith Troup 我沉淀下了自己
[00:42.50]你在我心里 Charlie
[00:43.53]在我心里 Charlie
[00:44.14]我穿了一身白色香奈儿 感觉自己非常神圣
[00:45.76]感觉自己非常神圣
[00:46.19]我的每一间公寓都是一尘不染
[00:47.32]每一间公寓都是一尘不染
[00:48.04]我们拼出了自己的道路 拼出了自己的道路
[00:51.14]
[00:52.84]我知道我们会过上更好的生活
[00:53.94]
[00:55.76]我知道我们会过上更好的生活
[00:57.04]
[00:58.71]拼出了自己的道路
[00:59.29]
[01:00.30]为什么他们的表情充满仇恨
[01:01.40]
[01:02.49]为什么他们表现得我好像没帮过他们 因为他们在假装热情
[01:05.08]
[01:05.98]一定觉得我不会说些什么
[01:07.30]
[01:08.47]我的第一笔交易就数额庞大 没什么好说的了
[01:10.42]
[01:11.23]我收到的感谢给了我鼓舞 我知道我改变了潮流
[01:13.51]
[01:14.02]我走到外面 阳光会变得闪耀 不会再有阴雨连绵的日子
[01:16.37]
[01:16.92]她喜欢我的气质 我也喜欢她那种氛围 我实话实说
[01:19.84]你祈祷的时候数一数
[01:21.53]感谢上帝给了我们这些幸福日子
[01:22.58]
[01:24.19]我们拼出了自己的道路 拼出了自己的道路
[01:27.20]
[01:28.80]我知道我们会过上更好的生活
[01:29.85]
[01:31.78]我知道我们会过上更好的生活
[01:32.99]
[01:34.71]拼出了自己的道路
[01:35.33]
[01:36.81]我只是找了个妞想放松放松 吞云吐雾 感受一下异国风情
[01:38.97]是的

[01:41.96]是的

[01:44.87]利润

[01:50.83]肚子里没点墨水

[01:53.87]对我坚定不移
